## hadamardProduct() function

Computes the hadamard (element-wise) product of two matrices.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hadamardProduct<S>(first: Matrix<S>, second: Matrix<S>): Matrix<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  first | [Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | the left matrix in the product |
|  second | [Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | the right matrix in the product |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt;
